programme.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: Mikael Blomkvist is a journalist who is hired by Mr. Vanger in order to reveal the secret of his niece's murder, almost forty years ago,whose body was never found. Thus Blomkvist resorts to young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander to help him reveal the mystery.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: The series details the story of Easy Company, a regiment of the 101st Airborne Division of the U.S Army during World War II. It follows them from the start of their training to the end of the war, as they participate in the liberation of Carentan and are the first to enter Hitler's retreat zone, among other achievements.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: When a spacecraft lands in New York City with a human-like alien named Klaatu on board, the army considers him a threat, but scientist Helen Benson finds out that he's here to save mankind.

programme.title: Boycott
programme.desc: A dramatization of the history-making bravery of Rosa Parks, who defied racist regulations that govern the seats African Americans were allowed to take on the bus, sparking a widespread boycott of the public buses as the civil rights movement picked up steam in the 1950s.

programme.title: Iron Jawed Angels
programme.desc: A biography of Alice Paul and Lucy Burns, two young radical women who played a key role in getting women the right to vote in America, managing to ultimately form the National Woman's Party.

programme.title: Big Little Lies
programme.desc: Madeline and Celeste live in a small town, and didn't expect the arrival of Jane and her strange child would affect them all . So little lies start to appear on ex-couples, school scandal, and these little lies we tell ourselves just to survive.

programme.title: The Nevers
programme.desc: In Victorian London, where a group of women is granted abnormal abilities, Amalia True and Penance Adair must protect and shelter these gifted Orphans, all the while they come face-to-face with their murderous nemesis who seeks to wipe out their kind.

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: Over the span of a week, the shocking revelations and exploits of the guests and employees at the White Lotus resort in Maui, Hawaii turn a supposedly relaxing vacation into a rather harrowing experience.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Armed with a technology that enables him to enter people's dreams and get access to their subconscious, Dom is hired to carry out a complicated task: set up the perfect circumstances to plant an idea in the mind of a businessman in the dream world.

programme.title: Succession
programme.desc: With their hands controlling the biggest media company in the world, the Logans remain as dysfunctional as they come, which is made more clear in the wake of the announcement of the family's patriarch that he is stepping down from his position.

programme.title: Bohemian Rhapsody
programme.desc: The story behind the song (Bohemian Rhapsody) written by Freddie Mercury and sung by the English rock band Queen, where Freddie was a member of the band. The film documents the events of the years that led Queen to their legendary appearance at the Live Aid concert in 1985.

programme.title: Yellowstone
programme.desc: John Dutton is the patriarch of a ranching family in Montana, who has to deal with various powerful players who attack his borders, as he sets out to protect his land from their clutches.

programme.desc: When Victor and his family move to his mysterious uncle's seemingly haunted mansion, the young detective makes it his mission to solve the case of a girl who died there 40 years ago.

programme.desc: Seven-year-old Albert, wants to convince his father that he's old enough to get a dog and uses the help of a magician to change his mind.

programme.title: The Secret of Kells
programme.desc: Little Brendan lives far away under the siege of barbarian raids during the Middle Ages. But a new life of adventures begins when a famous master illuminator arrives, bringing with him an unfinished ancient book full of wisdom and secrets.

programme.title: Ivan the Incredible
programme.desc: The poor child Ivan Olsen is bullied at school, and his father doesn't make him feel special. But his life changes when he finds a magical potion that makes him amazing in everything for one day. He decides to use it to change his father's opinion about him and teach his bullies a lesson.(n)

programme.title: Kurt Turns Evil
programme.desc: Kurt discovers that society doesn't appreciate forklift operators. When he finds everyone around him has respectable jobs, he decides to turn to a life of crime and become vicious.(n)

programme.desc: In a world inhabited by cars, Grady tries to educate the other cars about important environmental issues and the havoc that is being wreaked on the ecosystem.(n)

programme.desc: As Grumbo shoulders the responsibility of putting a weird theory to practice, Fancy, Chloe, and Victoria resent those attempts. Grambo pulls out all the stops to prove correct.(n)

programme.desc: Three siblings find themselves alone on the island of Spitsbergen, where they must join hands to survive a severe snowstorm on one hand and predator bears on the other.(n)

The Emperor's Secret
programme.desc: The inhabitants of a small Finnish village find themselves forced to defend their town against the tyrannical emperor who wishes to confiscate the swiveling wheel. When they resist him, he sends them to a barren island. Now, it's up to Pavo to lead them to safety and fight the evil emperor.(n)

programme.title: Honey Honey Bear
programme.desc: As they happily prepare food for a picnic, the two bears Brayer and Bramble are stopped by the two monkeys Tiky and Baboo who steal their food, while Vick hatches an evil plan to kidnap the animals of the forest.(n)

programme.title: Ploddy the Police Car on the Case
programme.desc: As he's getting ready to meet the Crown Princess, Ploddy the Police Car comes across environmental criminals threatening rare animals.(n)

programme.title: Cop Dog/ Marlowe
programme.desc: When a cop is killed, his young son tries to uncover the mystery of his murder with the aid of his dog, as a band of thieves goes after the family as revenge against the father.(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Strapped for cash for his girlfriend's surgery, Casey attempts an ill-fated drug heist for his old gangster boss. But when the heist lands him in trouble with a dangerous kingpin, he finds himself fighting to save his girlfriend, who was kidnapped by the kingpin.

programme.title: Fire with Fire
programme.desc: One day after a grueling day at work, fireman Jeremy Coleman witnesses the murder of a store owner and his son. Coleman is forced to testify against the ruthless criminal Hagen. He enters the Witness Protection Program as he tries to save himself and his loved ones.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Retired assassin John Wick (Keanu Reeves) unwillingly returns to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, but is faced with many challenges along the way, including a bounty that has been put on his life.

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: (Arthur Bishop), an assassin, decides to put his criminal past behind him and move forward. He gets drawn back to the crime world after his nemesis abducted his girlfriend - Bishop now must execute three assassinations around the world, and make them appear as accidents, to save his girlfriend.

programme.title: From Paris with Love
programme.desc: A personal aide to the U.S. ambassador in Paris named James Reese teams up with the American spy Charlie Wax to thwart a terrorist attack.

programme.title: First Kill
programme.desc: After the Wall Street broker Will and his son Danny witness the murder of a crooked police officer following a botched bank robbery, Will is forced to help the criminals recover the stolen money after they kidnap Danny.

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Death Cure
programme.desc: As a deadly disease called 'The Flare' spreads while Thomas and his friends need to break into the Last City and survive the WKCD troops as well as attacks by zombies, an arduous mission starts into the deadliest of labyrinths.

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Jason is obsessed with martial arts and kung-fu movies. One day he discovers an ancient stick that used to belong to the Monkey King, and when he holds it, he is transported back to ancient China.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis
programme.desc: During a riot In Los Angeles, 2028, over a decision to privatise the city’s water supply, two brothers fail to rob a bank and get badly wounded by the police. They escape to Hotel Artemis with an underground hospital treating criminals and run by “The Nurse”. The hotel is now full of criminals and a gravely wounded cop who got admitted by The Nurse, in violation of the hotel’s most sacred rule.

programme.title: Arsenal
programme.desc: Mikey (Johnathon Schaech) and JP (Adrian Grenier) grew up together and only had each other to rely on. As adults, JP became a successful owner of a construction company, while Mikey became a small-time mobster. After mikey gets abducted by ruthless crime boss Eddie King (Nicolas Cage), and is held for ransom, JP turns to their old friend Detective Sal (John Cusack) for help.

programme.title: While We're Young
programme.desc: Josh and Cornella Srebnick, a couple in their forties, living in New York City seem to have the perfect life. But their marriage and professional life are put to the test when two younger couples, Jamie and Darby, enter their lives.

programme.title: Delivery Man
programme.desc: David Wozniak discovers he has fathered over 500 children through donations to a fertility clinic twenty years ago. He wrestles with the decision to come forward or not when 142 of them file a lawsuit to find out who he is.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: When World War II ends, soldier Freddie goes home, looking for a new start. Somehow, things get rocky when he comes across a cult that is looking for new members.

programme.title: The Girl on the Train
programme.desc: A troubled divorcée gets tangled up in a dangerous web of secrets and lies, after she witnesses something shocking while taking the train.

programme.title: The 100-Year-Old Man Who Climbed Out the Window and Disappeared
programme.desc: After living a long and prosperous life, Allan Karlsson now believes that he must start his life again after being confined to a nursing home. On his 100th birthday, he jumps out of the window and embarks on a grand adventure that turns his life upside down.

programme.title: Elvis & Nixon
programme.desc: On the morning of December 21, 1970 during the presidency of Richard Nixon , Elvis Presley asked for an interview with President Nixon at the White House, during the interview at the Oval Office, Elvis gave the oath as a secret agent for the Drug enforcement office.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: The story of Max Perkins, a literary editor for a publishing house in the 1920s. He was one of the first to sign with great writers like Ernest Hemingway and Scott Fitzgerald. When a manuscript accidentally falls into his hands, written by an unknown, he's convinced that he discovered a new literary genius.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: When World War II ends, soldier Freddie goes home, looking for a new start. Somehow, things get rocky when he comes across a cult that is looking for new members.

programme.title: How to Talk to Girls at Parties
programme.desc: When two friends crash the wrong party, they come across a group of girls displaying weird behavior. Among them is Zan, who reveals that she is an alien who has left her species behind.
